readingKunHtml: みじ, いた, むご
sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you get a <radical>big</radical> <radical>hair</radical> stuck in your <radical>private</radical> <radical>soul</radical> it will be a <kanji>disaster</kanji>! Have you ever gotten a hair in your eye or your mouth that you just couldn't get out? You cough, your eyes water, it's awful! You can't focus on anything until it's gone. Now imagine if a big 'ol hair got stuck in your own private soul!!! Disaster!!!
meaningInfo: This disaster is ruining your life. You can't eat, sleep, all you can do is panic trying to get the hair out.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>disaster</kanji> is so huge that even <reading>San</reading>ta-san (<ja>さん</ja>) left his vacation in <reading>Zan</reading>zibar (<ja>ざん</ja>) to come tell you you're on the naughty list for being such a disaster person. WHAT?! Even you Santa-san?
readingInfo: Santa-san has forsaken you. Your life is a wreck. This is a total disaster just because of one big hair.
